answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!You will be surprised to know that stomach ulcers and severe acidity can result in hunger pangs. Even GERD presents with similar symptoms. At times the hunger pangs due to acidity wakes up a person in the wee hours of night.The other possibility is diabetes and hyperthyroidism. Worms in the gut too makes a person very hungry. The nutritional deficiency can also cause the period irregularity. Discuss these possibilities with your doctor.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
